title: Will Kalista be reworked in the distant future?
body: It just doesn't make sense why we have to keep nerfing this ADC's AA cause of her mobility. I wouldn't mind her being an immobile ADC so long as we get those nerfs reverted. Ridiculous that it should ever come to the point where an ADC's AA is what needs to be nerfed cause of an entirely different issue.

replies.body:
1. Remove dash.
2. Keep it only on Q if it's really needed.
3. Buff rest of kit
4. ???
5. Profit

> [{quoted}](name=nep2une,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LlWl1ElE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-09-20T19:59:39.649+0000)
>
> 1. Remove dash.
> 2. Keep it only on Q if it's really needed.
> 3. Buff rest of kit
> 4. ???
> 5. Profit

I honestly like the idea of moving her dash only to her Q since it makes sense and would be fair.
Probably not. She's not doing too good right now admittedly, but there are champions with far more pressing needs for a rework.
They could do something like change her passive into an ability and move like.... her W and make that her passive.

But the hopping is her entire image as a champion, that and rend, getting rid of it is killing her identity. Honestly I would be more down for a new ultimate. That's what really made her broken, a carry who could get a five man stun/knock up.
